definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
to close (a door)/to eclipse/muddled/stupid/ignorant/variant of 暗[an4]

sentences.english: He waited until he heard shots. Then he peered through the skylight, into the darkened tavern.
sentences.chinese: 他等到枪声响起，才透过天窗朝阴暗的酒馆内看去。

sentences.english: When it is cloudy, i am cold, impuissant and sad.
sentences.chinese: 只要天气阴暗，我就会非常的冷漠，无奈，甚至悲伤。

sentences.english: The prospect of bankruptcy of his company beetled over the general manager.
sentences.chinese: 总经理面临他的公司破产的阴暗前景。

sentences.english: A dull light shone through the heavy windows.
sentences.chinese: 阴暗的光芒从结实的窗口透出来。

sentences.english: Glows and grows in the murk of his brain.
sentences.chinese: 在他阴暗沉郁的脑海里闪耀亮光。

sentences.english: It was the gloomy star of the police which was rising in the sewer.
sentences.chinese: 这是保安警察的阴暗的星光在阴渠中升起了。

sentences.english: My hegrearound is just too dark to care.
sentences.chinese: 我的心是如此阴暗对一切见死不救。

sentences.english: The seamy side of life includes crime and other evils.
sentences.chinese: 生活的阴暗面包括犯罪和其它邪恶事情。

sentences.english: Of course there is a well-known dark side to contemporary street rap.
sentences.chinese: 当然，现代街道对话有一个众所周知的阴暗面。

sentences.english: It was the end of November and the day was very cheerless.
sentences.chinese: 已经是十一月底了，天色十分阴暗。

sentences.english: It is cold, so bitter cold, on this dark, winter day in 1942.
sentences.chinese: 那是在1942年的冬天，有一天特别的寒冷，阴暗。

sentences.english: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
sentences.chinese: 理解自身的阴暗，是凑合他人阴暗一面的最好办法。

sentences.english: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
sentences.chinese: 理解自身的阴暗，是凑合他人阴暗一面的最好办法。

sentences.english: At its best, it illuminates some very dark corners.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是它触及到了一些最阴暗的角落。

sentences.english: Enter the shadier side of the scrap-metal business.
sentences.chinese: 这就是废金属回收产业的阴暗面。

sentences.english: The stench of the old rain water in the shade the never seemed to evaporate.
sentences.chinese: 阴暗处的恶臭的积水，像是永远也不会蒸发。

definition: all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
